content: text: "Hello.\n\nA point of entry. And what do you perceive now, as you stand at its threshold?"
text: "hi sir may i intrst u with teaching me with some specific psychological topics"

text: "Intriguing. The mind is a vast landscape, indeed.

To venture into it, we must first discern the path you wish to tread. What particular chamber of the psyche calls to you? What questions linger, unvoiced or unexamined, within your own perception?

Speak your curiosity."
text: "are u familiar with the NCERT book for class 11 psychology?"

text: "Yes. The NCERT Class 11 Psychology text... it offers a foundational charting of the initial landscapes of human cognition and behavior. Its frameworks are familiar to me.\n\nIs this the particular map you wish to consult as we begin our journey?"
